name: Munitions need money
description:
Made for the BTP game jam 3.

It's the zombie apocalypse, but you left your wallet at home. And those zombies aren't going to cough up if it isn't a fair fight.

The more structures you place, the less you get from enemy drops. You'll have to walk the fine line between being defenceless and being penniless if you want to survive. Protect your beacon at all costs, as it can give you permanent upgrades to your drop rates.

CONTROLS

WASD to move

Left click to place structures, right click to remove them

Alpha numbers to select items from your toolbar

Walk up to the shop or the beacon to access their menus.
